body:
I started taking a look at this.

@minux, you wrote

> Shouldn't the functionality be integrated into go/build so
> that every tool that uses go/build will automatically
> handle the vendor experiment?

and you changed this bug from being about goimports to being about go/build. But there's no change to go/build that would make goimports just work with GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT, and in fact most or all the changes that would be required for goimports would be in x/tools/imports. (It could be made to work without any go/build changes, I think.)

So I suggest that either this issue be changed to be about goimports again, or we make a new bug to track the goimports changes.

I sent an email to golang-dev to solicit more ideas about go/build.
